Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Prohibits the mandated use of credit cards at state parks, recreational facilities or historic sites
Summary: Prohibits the mandated use of credit cards at state parks, recreational facilities or historic sites.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.15, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to prohibiting the mandated use of credit cards as a means of payment to use certain facilities at a state park, recreational facility or historic site
